title: Arclight Thresh??
body: A little while ago I saw a post on Reddit or somewhere about an Arclight thresh skin. With the release of Arclight Vayne and Arclight Vel`Koz I was wondering if anyone had any information on the progress about this awesome idea of a skin.

replies.body:
Just saw the skin and it looks awesome :')

The arclight skins are limited to champions starting with the letter V though, so we still gotta wait for our Veigars and Vladimirs and friends.

eh i was also thinking about a similar skin: archangel thresh :P but true true, thresh DID just recently get a blood moon skin. or riot could make another skin for bard cos elderwood looks like a pile of pug shit :P perhaps santa {{champion:432}} cos he is also pretty fat perhaps this snowdown :D

I doubt it he just got a bloodmoon skin. don't think he would get one before ZAC!!! Againâ€¦. but meh he goes with everything basically looks cool full metal, looks cool as a creature. just so many things go with thresh
